insert into t_my_client (client_name, short_name, client_code, client_type, province, city, county, detail_address, group_ids, group_names, post_code, tel_no, fax, remark, attachment_1, attachment_2, invoice_title, registration_no, bank_name, bank_no, registration_address, tel_no1, invoice_remark, status, company_id ) values (#{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telNo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: update t_my_client set client_name = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, short_name = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_code = #{clientCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_type = #{clientType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_ids = #{groupIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_names = #{groupNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel_no = #{telNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_1 = #{attachment1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_2 = #{attachment2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_title = #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registration_no = #{registrationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_no = #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registration_address = #{registrationAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel_no1 = #{telNo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_remark = #{invoiceRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where my_client_id = #{myClientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select my_client_id, client_name, short_name, client_code, client_type, province, city, county, detail_address, group_ids, group_names, post_code, tel_no, fax, remark, attachment_1, attachment_2, invoice_title, registration_no, bank_name, bank_no, registration_address, tel_no1, invoice_remark, status, company_id from t_my_client where my_client_id = #{myClientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
